observed: I was at my friends house on top of the hill looking down at his pond. On the far side of the pond I seen a solid black figure walking. Continued observing it walked through the pines for approx. 100 more feet. Black hair covered it's entire body. I was 100yds away when I observed this thing. It was approx. 8-9 feet tall. I judged his height with the 4 foot fence which he was on the other side of. Unk were he went.
location_details: Pine section of woods which are thick on the left and open where he was walking.
